## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### General

- [ ] My code follows the project's coding standards
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes

### Backend (if applicable)

- [ ] I have followed Java coding conventions
- [ ] I have added JavaDoc comments for public methods
- [ ] I have handled exceptions properly
- [ ] I have added appropriate logging
- [ ] I have validated input parameters
- [ ] Backend tests pass: `mvn test`

### Frontend (if applicable)

- [ ] I have followed React best practices
- [ ] I have handled loading and error states
- [ ] I have validated user input
- [ ] The UI is responsive and works on different screen sizes
- [ ] I have tested in multiple browsers (if UI changes)
- [ ] Frontend builds successfully: `npm run build`

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the README.md (if needed)
- [ ] I have updated the API documentation (if endpoints changed)
- [ ] I have updated AGENTS.md (if architecture changed)
- [ ] I have added/updated code comments where necessary
